course_title: Special Topics in Practical Theology: Visio and Lectio Divina
class_notes: (THIS COURSE IS FULL; contact candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (Course in the Community; offered in partnership with St. Thomas Moore Catholic Parish Decatur via the Candler Foundry) (Meets January 26-March 16 Only) (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Tuesday 6:30pm-8:30pm) (Students wishing to take the course for three credit hours will write an additional paper)
course_description: Special topic or one-time offering courses led by Candler regular and visiting faculty. Prerequisites may be required and are noted on the course schedule when applicable.
